item.description:
A new Vegetarian Indian restaurant in the area with plenty of Vegan options.

Please come by and make this group grow! It's an open forum and we encourage any ideas or suggestions for topics etc.. Whether you just want to network and meet local vegans like yourself, share recipes, if you are looking for support in making or maintaining this change in your life, want to discuss challenges and success or if you just want to try some yummy food...you are most welcome!
item.name: Worcester Vegan MeetUp & EatUp October Meetup
